capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid does look pretty tall for a half-giant, doesn't he? I mean, I've seen him towering over the rest of us in the Great Hall. It's one thing to hear about someone being big, but it's another thing entirely when you see them standing right in front of you!

I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he does look pretty tall for a gamekeeper. The way he moves with such ease, it's almost like he's gliding across the ground. TRIPLE: hagrid looks surprisingly-tall
